four.progpracticum

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • four.progpracticum.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a rectangle shape on a 2d plane.
    Version:
    Oct. 15, 2013
    Author:
    Monika

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String FORMAT
      A format string for decimal numbers.
      private double myLength
      size of one of parallel sides.
      private double myWidth
      size of one of perpendicular sides.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle()
      Creates a rectangle object with sides equal 0.
      Rectangle(double aLength, double aWidth)
      Creates a rectangle object of given dimensions.

    • Method Summary

      Flips the rectangle sides.

        public double getArea()
        Calculates rectangle area.
        Returns:

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        Calculates rectangle perimeter.
        Returns:
        width + width + length + length

      • resizeSides

        Resizes a rectangle.
        Parameters:
        aRatio - denotes a resizing ratio

      • flipSides

        public void flipSides()
        Flips the rectangle sides. custom.post length becomes width and width becomes length
